entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
